comment: /**  * Return the time to the next attempt to reconnect.  * @param attemptCount how many reconnect attempts have been made already  * @return the amount of time in milliseconds, or {@code null} to stop  */
code: /**  * Return the time to the next attempt to reconnect.  * @param attemptCount how many reconnect attempts have been made already  * @return the amount of time in milliseconds, or {@code null} to stop  */ @Nullable Long getTimeToNextAttempt(int attemptCount).
